fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: ~ Retribution (1-shot): If an Agent is lynched, you may choose to attack two extra targets with your Factional attack the next night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
~ For every kill you perform, you may leave a 100 character note that only Agents will see and be able to decipher.
~ If anyone attempts to roleblock you, you will attack them in addition to your regular attack.
